MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  L32 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Sefton Close and surrounding area. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:30am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:18am on 15th October 2020
